about_the_game:
STORY

Professor Raventhorpe, a physics teacher, built a time-traveling elevator to impress the history teacher by retrieving Nefertari's Tiara from the past. When Ari stumbles into his scheme, he's thrust into an adventure across time!

GAMEPLAY

Ari Buktu (pronounced 'Ari Buck-Too') is a feel-good adventure with a rousing score, funny underdog characters, and cinematic 2.5D puzzle platforming, crafted by a former Disney ride designer. You play as Ari, a student wanting to get home. These underdogs cross paths with history's greatest Tomb Raider, Belzoni, who wants the Tiara!


The Professor's gonna need a lot of help to pull this off - that's where Ari comes in. Somebody has to do the heavy lifting, right?


Crash through tombs, grapple over canyons, flee on the Anytime Elevator, escape on minecarts, swing through jungles, explore ancient tombs, uncover lost artifacts, and solve physical puzzles. But be careful, because one slip and you're toast.

WISHLIST FOR UPDATES

Dive into this epic feel-good adventure game with Ari, Professor Raventhorpe, and Julius and wishlist today!

FEATURES

  • Embark on a time-bending quest as Ari Buktu, a high schooler roped into a professor's wild schemes!
  • 13 thrilling levels across 6 stunning environments, from ancient tombs to treacherous canyons!
  • Master acrobatic moves like wall climbing and grapple swinging to outsmart history's greatest raiders!
  • An epic story game starring Joe Gaudet as Ari Buktu and Ray O'Hare as Professor Raventhorpe!
  • Solve mind-bending puzzles and uncover the secrets of the magical Tiara of Nefertari!
  • Experience cinematic cutscenes with visual gags inspired by classic 80s adventure films!
  • Escape certain doom in heart-pounding action sequences - crumbling temples, runaway minecarts, and more!
  • Immerse yourself in a beautiful orchestral adventure score that brings history to life!
  • Uncover hidden collectibles throughout your journey across time!
  • A nostalgic 4-hour single-player story crafted by a former Disney ride designer!
  • A feel-good adventure game, perfect for fans of classic console story games!

short_description: A single-player comedy adventure by a former Disney ride designer. Play as Ari, a student swept through history by his quirky professor on a vibrant time-traveling quest for a lost treasure.
